pokemon.name: treecko
pokemon.dex: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day's weather.

pokemon.name: grovyle
pokemon.dex: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.

pokemon.name: sceptile
pokemon.dex: The leaves on its forelegs are as sharp as swords. It agilely leaps about the branches of trees to strike.

pokemon.name: torchic
pokemon.dex: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.

pokemon.name: combusken
pokemon.dex: It boosts its concentration by emitting harsh cries. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.

pokemon.name: blaziken
pokemon.dex: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.

pokemon.name: mudkip
pokemon.dex: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.

pokemon.name: marshtomp
pokemon.dex: It is at its best when on muddy ground with poor footing. It quickly overwhelms foes struggling in mud.

pokemon.name: swampert
pokemon.dex: Its arms are rock-hard. With one swing, they can batter down its foe. It makes its nest on beautiful beaches.

pokemon.name: poochyena
pokemon.dex: It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense of smell lets it chase a chosen prey without ever losing track.

pokemon.name: mightyena
pokemon.dex: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.

pokemon.name: zigzagoon
pokemon.dex: A Pok√©mon with abundant curiosity. It shows an interest in everything, so it always zigs and zags.

pokemon.name: linoone
pokemon.dex: When running in a straight line, it can top 60 miles per hour. However, it has a tough time with curved roads.

pokemon.name: wurmple
pokemon.dex: It lives amidst tall grass and in forests. When attacked, it resists by pointing its venomous spikes at the foe.

pokemon.name: silcoon
pokemon.dex: It conserves its energy by moving as little as possible. It awaits evolution while drinking only a little rainwater.

pokemon.name: beautifly
pokemon.dex: Despite its appearance, it has an aggressive nature. It attacks by jabbing with its long, thin mouth.

pokemon.name: cascoon
pokemon.dex: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.

pokemon.name: dustox
pokemon.dex: It scatters horribly toxic dust when it senses danger. They tend to gather in the glow of streetlamps at night.
